topic.title: Lost post votes or message from deleted post or thread
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: any recent
  * Operating system: bug for zerotalk (windows 10)
  * Web browser: palemoon
  * Tor status: available
  * Opened port: yes
  * Special configuration: ____

### Step 2: Describe the problem:
People complain about not been able to post due to limit not getting raised so they go back and delete posts or entire threads then others people's posts get lost in the ether unable to manage them.

It also creates a continuity problem because posts that get deleted may cause threads to become incoherent and confusing to follow.

Limits maybe to low ? Or use a different method ?

1604067815_mirrored_slrslr_github.body: I was about to report this one to, i had thousands of the winerror 123 aswell

1604067751_mirrored_Visentinel_github.body:
Someone was complaining that it took to long

But that doesn't resolve the problem that if someone deletes content your likes and comments get trapped and you would have to manually edit your content.json yourself and most people don't know how to
